languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, про душу это ведь не метафора была. Он свой разум усилием воли через камень пропускает, а потом смотрит, что из того выйдет. Вы бы осторожнее с этим колдуном, больно приглянулся он шепоточкам моим".

"Lord Captain, all that about the soul? That wasn't a metaphor, you know. This one channels his own mind through the stone and then sees what comes of it. You should be careful around this sorcerer — I don't like how my whispers have taken a fancy to him."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, про душу это ведь не метафора была. Он свой разум усилием воли через камень пропускает, а потом смотрит, что из того выйдет. Вы бы осторожнее с этим колдуном, больно приглянулся он шепоточкам моим".

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、さっきの『魂』の話だけどね？あれ、比喩なんかじゃないんだよ。奴は、自分の精神をあの石に通して、そこから何が出てくるかを見るの。本当に用心した方がいいよ。このソーサラー、どうにも気に食わない。あたいの囁き声が、妙にあいつに惹かれてるのが気に入らない」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, all that about the soul? That wasn't a metaphor, you know. This one channels his own mind through the stone and then sees what comes of it. You should be careful around this sorcerer — I don't like how my whispers have taken a fancy to him."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、さっきの『魂』の話だけどね？あれ、比喩なんかじゃないんだよ。奴は、自分の精神をあの石に通して、そこから何が出てくるかを見るの。本当に用心した方がいいよ。このソーサラー、どうにも気に食わない。あたいの囁き声が、妙にあいつに惹かれてるのが気に入らない」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, all das über die Seele? Das war keine Metapher, wisst Ihr? Dieser hier kanalisiert seinen eigenen Verstand durch den Stein und sieht dann, was daraus wird. Ihr solltet im Umgang mit diesem Hexer Vorsicht walten lassen. Mein Flüstern hat Gefallen an ihm gefunden, das beunruhigt mich."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, all that about the soul? That wasn't a metaphor, you know. This one channels his own mind through the stone and then sees what comes of it. You should be careful around this sorcerer — I don't like how my whispers have taken a fancy to him."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, all das über die Seele? Das war keine Metapher, wisst Ihr? Dieser hier kanalisiert seinen eigenen Verstand durch den Stein und sieht dann, was daraus wird. Ihr solltet im Umgang mit diesem Hexer Vorsicht walten lassen. Mein Flüstern hat Gefallen an ihm gefunden, das beunruhigt mich."

languages.text: « Vous savez, {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Ce qu'il vous a dit à propos de l'âme, ce n'était pas une métaphore. Ce sorcier canalise son propre esprit dans la pierre pour voir ce que ça donne. Je vous conseille de vous méfier de lui ; mes murmures semblent l'apprécier et ça ne me dit rien qui vaille. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, all that about the soul? That wasn't a metaphor, you know. This one channels his own mind through the stone and then sees what comes of it. You should be careful around this sorcerer — I don't like how my whispers have taken a fancy to him."

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}... Ce qu'il vous a dit à propos de l'âme, ce n'était pas une métaphore. Ce sorcier canalise son propre esprit dans la pierre pour voir ce que ça donne. Je vous conseille de vous méfier de lui ; mes murmures semblent l'apprécier et ça ne me dit rien qui vaille. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, ¿todo eso del alma? No era una metáfora, ¿sabe? Este canaliza su propia mente a través de la piedra y luego ve lo que emerge de ella. Debería tener cuidado en presencia de este hechicero; le ha caído en gracia a mis susurros, y eso no me gusta nada».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, all that about the soul? That wasn't a metaphor, you know. This one channels his own mind through the stone and then sees what comes of it. You should be careful around this sorcerer — I don't like how my whispers have taken a fancy to him."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, ¿todo eso del alma? No era una metáfora, ¿sabe? Este canaliza su propia mente a través de la piedra y luego ve lo que emerge de ella. Debería tener cuidado en presencia de este hechicero; le ha caído en gracia a mis susurros, y eso no me gusta nada».

languages.text: “舰长大人，听到那个人怎么形容他的灵魂了吗？说实话，他并不是在打比方。那个人会通过水晶引导他自己的思想，从而看到未来的景象。在这个巫师身边时务必当心，那些耳语声对这个人产生了好感，这可不是什么好兆头。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, all that about the soul? That wasn't a metaphor, you know. This one channels his own mind through the stone and then sees what comes of it. You should be careful around this sorcerer — I don't like how my whispers have taken a fancy to him."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，听到那个人怎么形容他的灵魂了吗？说实话，他并不是在打比方。那个人会通过水晶引导他自己的思想，从而看到未来的景象。在这个巫师身边时务必当心，那些耳语声对这个人产生了好感，这可不是什么好兆头。”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, ruh konusundaki tüm o şeyler... Metafor değildi onlar, biliyorsun. Bu kişi kendi zihnini taşa yönlendirip sonrasında olacaklara bakıyor. Bu sahirin yanında dikkatli olmak gerek. Fısıldayanlarımın onu sevmesinden rahatsızım."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, all that about the soul? That wasn't a metaphor, you know. This one channels his own mind through the stone and then sees what comes of it. You should be careful around this sorcerer — I don't like how my whispers have taken a fancy to him."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, ruh konusundaki tüm o şeyler... Metafor değildi onlar, biliyorsun. Bu kişi kendi zihnini taşa yönlendirip sonrasında olacaklara bakıyor. Bu sahirin yanında dikkatli olmak gerek. Fısıldayanlarımın onu sevmesinden rahatsızım."
